title: Expand candlestick pattern detection with 12 additional patterns and categorize all patterns into Bullish/Bearish/Neutral types

requirements.summary: Expand candlestick pattern detection engine to recognize 12 additional patterns with categorization
acceptanceCriteria: Pattern detection functions return pattern name and category (bullish/bearish/neutral) for all 12 new patterns
Inverse Hammer detection checks for small body at top with long lower wick
Piercing Line detection identifies bullish two-candle pattern where second candle closes above midpoint of first bearish candle
Morning Star detection recognizes three-candle bullish reversal pattern
Three White Soldiers detection identifies three consecutive long bullish candles
Dragonfly Doji detection checks for Doji with long lower wick and no upper wick at support levels
Hanging Man detection identifies bearish pattern with small body at top and long lower wick
Evening Star detection recognizes three-candle bearish reversal pattern
Three Black Crows detection identifies three consecutive long bearish candles
Dark Cloud Cover detection identifies bearish two-candle pattern where second candle opens above first and closes below midpoint
Gravestone Doji detection checks for Doji with long upper wick and no lower wick at resistance levels
Doji detection identifies candles with nearly equal open and close prices
Spinning Top detection identifies small body with upper and lower wicks showing indecision

file_operations.description: Add 12 new candlestick pattern detection functions (Inverse Hammer, Piercing Line, Morning Star, Three White Soldiers, Dragonfly Doji, Hanging Man, Evening Star, Three Black Crows, Dark Cloud Cover, Gravestone Doji, Doji, Spinning Top) to the detectCandlestickPatterns function. Each pattern detection should return an object with patternType and category fields where category is 'bullish', 'bearish', or 'neutral'. Preserve existing detection logic for Hammer, Shooting Star, Bullish Engulfing, and Bearish Engulfing patterns. Update the CandlestickPattern type to include a category field if not already present.
